author: Source: Chardandilminsternews.co.uk
title: Sir Bradley Wiggins wants to race in Tour of California next year - Chardandilminsternews.co.uk
text:
Sir Bradley Wiggins has signalled his intention to compete in next May's Tour of California in what could be his final road race before the Rio Olympics. Wiggins, who won the 2014 edition of the California Tour for Team Sky, has been focused on the track since the spring and last week claimed his first ever European title as he helped Britain to gold in the team pursuit in Grenchen.
 Chardandilminsternews.co.uk.
